channel.title: Facial Recognition on ML-Everything
channel.description: Recent content in Facial Recognition on ML-Everything

item.title: How Facial Recognition Works Part 1: Face Detection
item.description: Much has been written about facial recognition and its role in society. As with a lot of topics concerning artificial intelligence, it is often discussed with an air of mysticism, as though all the all seeing machines can now peer into our souls. Depending on the narrative of the piece, its accuracy is chillingly accurate or appallingly inadequate for use. Amazon got flack for pitching their Reckognition service to law enforcement, San Fransisco banned the technology, and it has even been called racist.
